channel.title: Imagestream on Nube
channel.description: Recent content in Imagestream on Nube

item.title: Creating Your Own Istio (Part 1)
item.description: I just wanted an excuse to write a container oriented application, what do I mean by that? that’s not why micro-services are just a bunch of containers talking to one each other. That’s true but what I mean is separate different behaviour of an application inside containers and then reuse this containers in other applications.
